title: Herbed Quinoa and Chickpea Pilaf
directions: Combine oil, Recaito, quinoa, orange juice, salt and 3/4 cup water to boil. Simmer covered over medium-low heat, until liquid is absorbed and quinoa is tender, 20 minutes. Stir in chick peas. Remove from heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Stir in mint, parsley and hazelnuts.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon GOYA Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 (15.5 ounce) can GOYA Chick Peas, rinsed and drained
⅓ cup toasted hazelnuts or pistachios, chopped
